source.cf9a2196:
#1. Correlation between income and Personal Loan
Income_Loan_Percentage = Bank_Personal_Loan.groupby('Personal Loan')['Income'].agg([np.mean,'count'])
Income_Loan_Percentage.rename(columns={'mean': 'Income_Mean','count':'Number of People'})
source.79fda913:

CCAvg_Loan_Percentage.rename(columns={'mean': 'CCAvg_Mean','count':'Number of People'})
source.8b5279a8:

source.18b4255a:
Finding the potential customers who have a higher probability of purchasing the loan.
识别出最有可能购买贷款的潜在客户
source.f9c0256f:
+ <font face="Frutiger" size=2 >
Customers with mortgage has a 10.92% proportion of purchasing the personal loan and it is slightly higher than the customers who do not have the mortgage of 9.01% proportion. 
+ 有抵押的客户在购买个人贷款中所占比例为10.92％，略高于没有抵押的客户占比9.01%。
source.f6ca744d:
<font face="Frutiger" size=2 > 
+ Customers who purchaed the personal loan have a rising trend followed by the increasing education level.
+ Customers who purchased the personal loan in level 2 education have a 2.9 times of the proportion compared with customers in level 1 education.
+ Customers in education level 2 and level 3 have no  significant difference in proportion. 
+ 随着受教育程度升高，购买个人贷款的客户占比也随之呈上升趋势。
+ 在2级教育中购买个人贷款的客户所占比例是1级教育中客户的2.9倍。
+ 2级和3级教育程度的客户所占比例没有显着差异。
source.fb0d27af:
From One-Factor Analysis: + Customers with cd account, mortgage and security account have higher proportion to purchase the personal loan. + Customers whose annual income range from $ 120,000 - $ 195,000 have the above average proportion level to purchase the personal loan. + Customers whose CCAvg range from \\$ 3,000 - \\$ 6,300 and \\$ 8,600 - \\$ 9,600 have the above average proportion level to purchase the personal loan. + Customers who are in education 2 and 3 level have the higher proportion to purchase the personal loan. + There are no significant difference in proportion of purchasing personal loan within these 4 family type.
From Two-Factor Analysis: + Customers who have the CD account in income range from \\$89,600-\\$190,400 have the above average proportion of purchasing the personal loan. + Customers who have the CD account in CC Avg range from \\$3,000-\\$8,100 have the above average proportion of purchasing the personal loan. + It seems that customers who live near the coastal homes and with above average income have the higher proportion to purchase the personal loan.
Three-Factor Analysis: + Customers with the CD account in education level 2 and in income range from \\$84,000-\\$190,400 have the above average proportion who purchased the personal loan. + Customers with CD Account and in 3-members-family type have the above average proportion in purchasing the personal loan in income range from \\$80,000 -\\$190,000.
Based on the analysis above, we can find our target customers who will have more willingness to purchase the bank personal loan.
单因素分析： + 拥有存款帐户，房贷账户和证券帐户的客户在购买个人贷款的占比会更高。 + 年收入在120,000到195,000美元之间的客户具有高于上述平均比例的水平。 + 信用卡消费额范围从\\$ 3,000- \\$ 6,300以及 \\$ 8,600-\\$ 9,600的客户具有高于上述平均占比水平。 + 2级和3级教育程度的客户所占比例没有显着差异，大约为一级的2.9倍。 + 在这4个家庭人数类型中，购买个人贷款的客户占比没有显着差异。 双因素分析： + 有存款帐户且收入在 89,600美元至 190,400美元之间的客户，购买个人贷款的比例高于整体上述平均水平。 + 有存款帐户且信用卡月消费范围为\\ $ 3,000-\\\ $ 8,100之间的客户具有高于整体上述平均水平的个人贷款购买比例。 + 居住在沿海附近且年收入高于平均水平的客户似乎购买个人贷款的比例更高。 三因素分析： + 有存款帐户、学历级别为2且收入在\\ $ 84,000-\\\ $ 190,400之间的客户购买个人贷款的比例高于平均水平 + 有存款帐户且为3成员家庭类型的客户在购买个人贷款中的平均比例高于上述平均比例并且收入范围为\\ $ 80,000-\\ $ 190,000。
基于上述分析，我们可以找到有更大可能性去购买银行个人贷款的目标客户。
source.6ed348c1: #### <font face="Frutiger" size=2 color=#008080 >Overview of the correlations
source.10f8b68a:
<font face="Frutiger" size=2> 
+ Whether have the cd account or not, customers have the largest average proportion of purchasing personal loan in 3-members-family type.
+ Customers with CD Account and in 3-members-family type have the above average proportion in purchasing the personal loan in income range from \\$80,000 -\\$190,000. 
+ 无论是否拥有存款帐户，在三人家庭人数类型中，客户购买个人贷款的平均比例和其他家庭人数类型比较为最大。
+ 有存款帐户且为3成员家庭类型的客户在购买个人贷款中的平均比例高于上述平均比例并且收入范围为\\ $ 80,000-\\ $ 190,000。

source.57b67155:
<font face="Frutiger" size=2 > 
+ 46.36% of customers with CD account chose to purchase the personal loan.
+ 7.24% of customers without CD account chose to purchase the personal loan.
+ Customers with CD account have 6.4 times of probability to purchase the personal loan compared to customers without CD account.

+ 有存款帐户的客户中有46.36％选择购买个人贷款。
+ 没有存款帐户的客户中有7.24％选择购买个人贷款。
+ 具有存款帐户的客户购买个人贷款的概率是没有存款帐户的客户的6.4倍。
source.5057eac7:
This case is about a bank (Thera Bank) which has a growing customer base. Majority of these customers are liability customers (depositors) with varying size of deposits. The number of customers who are also borrowers (asset customers) is quite small, and the bank is interested in expanding this base rapidly to bring in more loan business and in the process, earn more through the interest on loans. In particular, the management wants to explore ways of converting its liability customers to personal loan customers (while retaining them as depositors).
A campaign that the bank ran last year for liability customers showed a healthy conversion rate of over 9% success. This has encouraged the retail marketing department to devise campaigns to better target marketing to increase the success ratio with a minimal budget.
The department wants to build a model that will help them identify the potential customers who have a higher probability of purchasing the loan. This will increase the success ratio while at the same time reduce the cost of the campaign.
该数据分析项目涉及的是一家拥有不断增长的客户基础的银行（Thera Bank）。这些客户中的大多数是存款大小不等的存款人(属于银行的负债）。但是借款人客户（属于银行的资产）数量很少，银行希望迅速扩大借款人客户基础，以开展更多的贷款业务，并在此过程中通过贷款利息赚取更多。管理层希望找到将存款客户转换为贷款客户的方法。
Thera Bank在去年针对存款客户开展的一项活动成功实现了9％以上的存转贷转化率。这鼓励了零售营销部门去设计更多活动以更好地针对性营销，并希望以最小的预算增加成功率。
该部门希望找到精准的潜在目标客户群体，增加成功率，同时降低活动成本。
source.5d2d61a7:
<font face="Frutiger" size=2> 
+ Customers in CC Avg range from \\$0 - \\$8,400 with the CD account have the higher proportion of purchasing the personal loan than customers who do not have the CD account.
+ Customers who have the CD account in CC Avg range from \\$3,000-\\$8,100 have the above average proportion of purchasing the personal loan.
+ 有存款帐户且信用卡月消费范围为\\ $ 0-\\ $ 8,400的客户购买个人贷款的比例要高于没有存款帐户的客户。
+ 有存款帐户且信用卡月消费范围为\\ $ 3,000-\\\ $ 8,100之间的客户具有高于整体上述平均水平的个人贷款购买比例。
source.60f44379:
+ <font face="Frutiger" size=2> The mortgage range from \\$0-\\$52,000 has the highest proportion 6.24% of customers who purchased personal loan. 
+ There are no significant difference in proportion in the rest of the mortgage bin.
+ 从\\$ 0至\\$ 52,000的抵押贷款范围占购买个人贷款的客户的比例最高，为6.24％。
+ 其余抵押房屋的比例没有显着差异.
source.09870cd8:
<font face="Frutiger" size=2> 
+ Customers with the CD account in education level 2 have the largest proportion who purchased the personal loan. 
+ Customers with the CD account in education level 2 and in income range from \\$84,000-\\$190,400 have the above average proportion who purchased the personal loan. 
+ 有存款账户且学历级别位2的客户购买个人贷款的平均比例最大。
+ 有存款帐户、学历级别为2且收入在\\ $ 84,000-\\\ $ 190,400之间的客户购买个人贷款的比例高于平均水平。
source.a6ca553b:
<font face="Frutiger" size=2 > 
+ The average proportion of customers who purchased the personal loan is 34.39%. 
+ The customers whose CCAvg range from \\$ 3,000 - \\$ 6,300 and \\$ 8,600 - \\$ 9,600 have the above average proportion level. 
+ The highest proportion 100% is from the CCAvg range from \\$ 9,000 - \\$ 9,600 and this range of CCAvg only conclude 6 customers.  

+ 购买了个人贷款的客户占比在不同信用卡消费额范围的总平均值为34.39％。
+ 信用卡消费额范围从\\$ 3,000- \\$ 6,300以及 \\$ 8,600-\\$ 9,600的客户具有高于上述平均占比水平。
+ 最高个人贷款购买的客户占比100％来自信用卡消费额 \\$ 9,000-\\$ 9,600，但范围仅有6个客户。
source.9cb45fce:
<font face="Frutiger" size=2 > 
+ The average income of customers who purchased the personal loan is 2.2 times of customers who did not purchase the personal loan. 
+ 购买了个人贷款的客户平均收入是未购买个人贷款的客户的2.2倍。
source.24968f49:
The dataset lists 5,000 customers in Thera Bank. In order to find the potential customers, I will analyze the related features of customers who purchased the loan from last campaign. I use Tableau to build my visualization part.
该数据集列出了Thera Bank的5,000个客户。为了找到潜在的客户，我将重点分析在上次活动中购买了贷款的客户的相关特征。我将用Tableau去制作可视化部分。
source.9b200bf4:
<font face="Frutiger" size=2>

+ 居住在沿海附近且年收入高于平均水平的客户似乎购买个人贷款的比例更高。

+ 有存款帐户且收入在 89,600美元至 190,400美元之间的客户，购买个人贷款的比例高于整体上述平均水平。

source.004a7da8:
<font face="Frutiger" size=2 > 
Column Description
+ ID: Customer ID
+ Age: Customer's age in completed years
+ Experience: #years of professional experience
+ Income: Annual income of the customer (USD 1000)
+ ZIPCode: Home Address ZIP code.
+ Family: Family size of the customer
+ CCAvg: Avg. spending on credit cards per month (USD 1000)
+ Education: Education Level. 1: Undergrad; 2: Graduate; 3: Advanced/Professional
+ Mortgage: Value of house mortgage if any. (USD 1000)
+ Personal Loan: Did this customer accept the personal loan offered in the last campaign?     (1:Yes; 0:No)
+ Securities Account: Does the customer have a securities account with the bank?(1:Yes; 0:No)
+ CD Account: Does the customer have a certificate of deposit (CD) account with the bank? (1:Yes; 0:No)
